_sText:
Here you go, a map that surely beats DR_canal. As said, it goes with the combine theme from half life 2. It consists all kind of traps. A bit info about it:

- Over 40 spawn points
- Rich 3D skybox
- Over 20 traps
- Many random breakables
- Cube maps
- Indoors
- Outdoors
- AFK killer
- Soundscape + random timed sounds

Video in HD
<iframe width="450" height="280" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/uM14VV4Wdvc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

> To install the map, put the cstrike folder in the download over the old one and overwrite.

Hope you enjoy the map. Put a lot of time in it! Rating, commenting, advising is more then welcome! Enjoy! :D
